General ContractorsOwners
Solutions
Progress TrackingAI Vision
Services
PlatformSupport
Track3D leverages computer vision and AI to automatically track construction progress from standard photos and videos. Technology compares site conditions against BIM models and schedules to measure completion percentages and identify variances. Eliminates manual progress reporting and provides objective, data-driven insights for project stakeholders. Helps teams verify contractor pay applications, identify delays early, and maintain accurate project records with minimal effort.
